findings.title: Inconsistent fee basis in swap calculation
findings.description: The K invariant check uses FEE_DENOMINATOR_CALC (1000) while balance adjustments use FEE_DENOMINATOR_SWAP (10000). This 10x mismatch allows extracting more value than deposited.
findings.impact: Attackers can drain liquidity pools by exploiting the calculation mismatch.
findings.recommendation: Use consistent fee basis throughout all calculations. Define once, reference everywhere.
